title: Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
OB: The Open Mode preference in the Workbench settings is not reset when clicking on the 'Restore Defaults' button.
EB: The Open Mode preference should be reset to its default value when selecting the 'Restore Defaults' option.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the Workbench settings.  
2. Change the Open Mode to 'Single Click' and select both checkboxes.  
3. Click on the 'Restore Defaults' button.  
4. Verify that the Open Mode is reverted back to 'Double Click' and both checkboxes are cleared.
